Firstpage.title: - Karen Salmansohn
Firstpage.content: Healthy does NOT mean starving yourself EVER. Healthy means eating the right food in the right amount.

Firstpage.title: - Edward Stanley
Firstpage.content: Those who think they have no time for healthy eating will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
